name: The Misadventure of Bogart the Frog
name_original: The Misadventure of Bogart the Frog
description:
Made by JaredMV and IanGoGo in 5 hours 20 minutes for the MS paint jam and the Mini-Jam 79.

Mobile Controls:

Tap to short/quick jump

Long Tap to long jump

Controls:

Jump is Space Bar, W or Up key

Tap Space Bar (W/Up Key) to short/quick jump

Hold Space Bar (W/Up Key) to long jump

Lore:

Lore to come soon, feel free to add Lore in the comments below!
